TopicTitle: hey anyone know i cant see my relay network overlay

Articles.Content: Not sure, but your active vessel has no connection to KSC (upper left below clock).  How much relay network should you be seeing?

yea but i cant see other satelite connected to KSC and talking to my main satelite

Edited April 13, 2022 by bambamddog
Does your active vessel even have EC / power?  It will have no connections if it has no power

I don't know.  It seems that that you know it should be working and that you know there is no reason it would not work.  I think until you consider there is a reason it is not working, and look for it, you will have trouble seeing why it is not working.  Are antennas deployed?  Did you use relay antennas on the satellites?
Seems to be an issue for modded support. And so, thread moved. Good luck.
